lines.text:
[singing]
# Everybody thinks I'm screwy. / Screwy as a loon, that's me. / When I go on a driving spree / The coppers all get panicky. / Honk my horn! / Strip my gears! / So I'm screwy, / What, what, what can I do? / I ask you! #
Follow that motorcycle! Follow that horse! Follow that buggy! Follow that China-boy!
